item.description:
For folks who are new or actively use Abraham teachings,
Esther & Jerry Hicks are back in town.

Date: Sunday, 6/21/09
Time: 9:30 AM to 4:00 PM
Cost: $195; $245 at the door

RSVP here: so we know who's attending

Then Register at: http://www.abraham-hi....
(Details included here)

*********************************************
Read notes taken by BostonLOA memebrs who attended the Abraham-Hicks LOA Workshop on June 30, 2008:

(1) http://lawofattractio...
Stefan Pagacik shares his notes from the Esther and Jerry Hicks LOA Workshop he attended on Jun 30, 2008

(2 a) http://lawofattractio...
notes from Burlington LOA workshop

(2 b) http://lawofattractio...
part 2 notes from Burlington workshop
